translated: The Dhamma protects one who lives by the Dhamma;
The Dhamma, when well practiced, leads to happiness.
This is the benefit of practicing the Dhamma:
One who lives by the Dhamma does not go to a bad destination.
do not have the same result.
the Dhamma leads to a good destination.
Therefore, one should have a desire for the Dhamma.
Thus rejoicing, the Well-Gone One, the Teacher,
The disciples of the best of the Well-Gone Ones, established in the Dhamma,
